thread.title: A Beautiful Acoustic Cover of the Iconic Solo From ‘Comfortably Numb’ Played on a Gorgeous Guitar
thread.title_full: A Beautiful Acoustic Cover of the Iconic Solo From ‘Comfortably Numb’ Played on a Gorgeous Guitar

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Beautiful Acoustic Cover of the Iconic Solo From ‘Comfortably Numb’ Played on a Gorgeous Guitar
text:
Finnish musician Juha Järvinen who is also known as the Acoustician performed an absolutely beautiful acoustic cover of David Gilmour ‘s iconic solo from the anthemic Pink Floyd song “ Comfortably Numb ” on an equally beautiful Ibanez EW50 . Järvinen has covered a number of other solos on this gorgeous guitar, including “ Sultans of Swing ” by Dire Straits , “Bohemian Rhapsody” by Queen and “ Hotel California ” by The Eagles . Other solos are available on his YouTube page .



via reddit
